My daughter is into the Kawaii style and really wanted a skirt like this. She is still young so I was worried that it would be a little too short for her, but it ended up being perfect. The zippers down the front are also functional so you can close them and have just the plaid peeking out from underneath. I definitely think that worn a certain way this could be a very flattering and sexy skirt on someone older and more filled out but for what I wanted it for it was also perfect and I am super happy with it and so is my daughter. Love the little zippers covering the second layer of the skirt, it makes it look very full compared to my other skirts. I would say the skirt ended up being a little big on me (I'm 5'0) and sits more on my hips than higher up like I would like. I recommend ordering a smaller size.

This skirt is adorable and I love it. It feels like high quality to me, but I’m used to buying thrifted clothes and sewing them to make them fit or work right so grain of salt on that. I bought this with gift money. I wore it once for under 4hrs and when I went to fold it to put it away (it wasn’t dirty), I found that the back zipper was undone. I didn’t use it because this thing STRETCHES, like nearly 5in on either side, and the skirt is already a little big on me. I figured unzip, rezip, and it’s fine. Except, even the zipper doesn’t work?! It’s cute enough I am tempted to just remove the zipper and turn it into a seam to keep it, but I shouldn’t have to for my special treat $50 skirt. I shouldn’t have to for anything over $25 unless it’s been “well loved.”  Don’t waste your time.

Bought this in my regular size and it fits and looks good everywhere except from behind. Love this skirt! The style is so cute and trendy and the teal blue color is very pretty! It fits perfectly well and is very comfortable. Love the flow if this skirt. Definitely recommend!

This skirt fits perfectly in the size small.  I am 5 foot 2 and 113 pounds. This is not too short.  It doesn't make me feel like my underwear are exposed.  I like this skirt.

This skirt is cute but def. not true to size. I am 196 5'1" who normally wears a 2XL in shorts bought an 4XL in this skirt because I was skeptical of the reviews. This is a great skirt. The material is soft and comfortable. The fit is just right and provides me a lot of comfort. The color is wonderful. It helps me to look stylish without even trying.

I think it would look nicer without zippers running down the front as it's a little distracting. I like that it's flowy and lightweight though. It just needs a design update. A skirt with 3 zippers that aren't functioning 100% is a bit frustrating.

Came exactly as in picture, just a little wrinkles, which should be ok after steaming/ironing. Love the design, especially when I turn. It's a skirt, no separation like a pant, which makes it easy to go to restroom. Love it!
Fits so cute and no issues with workmanship. The peek a boo material is nice and not bad for the price. She likes the wide waistline and no problem with the zippers.

I love this cute mini skirt! I’m reviewing a size medium. I’m 5’2 and I weigh 130-135 lbs. It’s true to size. There are two zippers on this skirt, you can zip it down to show off just the one color or zip it up and show off the plaid print. It’s an adorable skirt. I truly love it. I highly recommend it.
Made very well, no loose strands, fits and feels very comfortable. I would highly recommend!
this runs a little big, but i really enjoy the pattern with the second pattern showing underneath. the zippers are super cute details too

评论概述: I am a fan of this brand's unique style of skirts!
评论详情: While they do have issues with using not the best quality zippers that is something you just have to overlook IF you want this style skirt with the second layer of contrasting material peeking through when you walk!  Also I have purchased 2 identical skirts from the same seller in the past and there was a variation in the material and elastic style waistband...... While they both look great they were not true to the listing's picture and size chart as one had a wider waistband for the same size (medium) so that may be the same with this one when you order it. ....If you are willing to go with the flow on the hopes of getting one that fits I say it is definitely worth the effort as these skirts are guys so darn cute!!!  I am older and I don't give a flip if they are a more youthful look than someone my age should wear. I am dressing for ME, no one else, so IF you like it, get it!!I got you Boo!  ;-)
Very cute dress, white as it shows no difference in the picture, packaging open no taste. The quality is good.

The layering of colors and patterns in the skirt reminds me of what country girls wear when square dancing.  Also, it is great for spinning in if you are wearing shorts underneath it. I love the high waist design that hides my stomach. My only complaint is that it is a teeny bit wrinkly.

I really like this skirt! It's a great cut color and design. It's fun a flowy. I like the unique pattern and color. Very good quality! Even though this is actually a skirt and not shorts it still feels like I good slip on shorts under it and wear it on outdoor adventures...today it's worn to the office so very versatile!

This skrit is so freaking cute on me. I love how it feels.  Was kinda scared to get the size I got. I put it on and it fell right into place. Just need a shirt to complement it and I have a nice fit going 10/10 would recommend.

评论概述: Cute skirt! Sizing is way off though
评论详情: Got this for my teen. She absolutely loves it! The styling is super cute. The description doesn't specifically say so, but if you don't mind a slight seam showing, it's wearable in reverse too for full red plaid! The seam is barely noticeable when worn this way and adds to even more cute outfits. The sizing is way off though. My teen is normally a 13/14 or 15/16 in jeans and skirts (depending on the brand), but according to the size chart needed a 2x! I can wear a 2x! Its a little loose on her, and I probably could have got a 1x or just xl, but even then, it's off. However she is very happy with it and I'm happy I got it for her. It is super cute - just pay very close attention to the measurements!
This skirt is excellently made and super comfortable. The fabric is high quality and soft to the touch. The stitching is impeccable and I am impressed with how well-made it is.
This is not plastic feeling and is comfortable to wear for a night out.

评论概述: Adorable skirt the material is very nice and will hold up after washes over time love it

This skirt is nicely made and looks good once on. I love the plaid peekaboo slits and that you can actually use the zippers. The material is soft and comfortable as well. It fits me as it should. I'm pleased with it.
It’s cute comfy and stretch’s which is nice it’s longer then I thought it would be not sure what kind of shirt yet to put with it but I like it
This skirt is gorgeous and very well made. It runs small but does have some stretch to it.

评论概述: zipper popped with little stress but easily fixed too
评论详情: This skirt was slightly smaller than we expected but still fit with some room. The main zipper popped on the very first wear with almost no stress when bending over. It was easy to get back together and we haven't had an issue again with it popping but we are extra careful. It's super cute and the fabric is a nice thick heavy fabric that should be durable. The colors have held up to several washes and the fabric hasn't picked in situations I was sure it would, like sitting on the sidewalk. I like that you can adjust the peak-a-boo zippers and that it adds more flare as well. Lots of compliments and looks super cute with boots, heels, and sneakers. Worn it with leggings, fishnets, and bare-legged and all looks have been great! So it can go grunge, sexy, or more conservative. It really is super versatile!

Personally, I'm not a fan of these kind of invisible zippers, they always tend to be a bit harder to use and I always feel like I'll yank too hard and break them, but it is pretty standard so it's nothing bad per se (just annoying). The skirt is of a decent material, I wouldn't say it feels amazing but it's nice and sturdy. Additionally, the color is very nice and I didn't realize before getting it, but the zippers in front can be zipped up or down depending on your preference (I much prefer these more noticeable zippers, they are smooth to use and sturdy). It fits well and looks cute, and I'm happy with the skirt.
The style and material are absolutely gorgeous and made very well!

评论概述: I sized up for a longer length but it looks better at your normal size
评论详情: I didn't want this to be super short on me so I sized wayyyyy up even though I normally wear a small. Unfortunately, the waist is larger than the Amazon size page shows so I can't keep it above my hips. In the right size, this would be a nice skirt, though, and I'm rating it to reflect that. It's thick, sturdy, and well made. Once ironed, it falls in a flattering way without sticking out too much. The zippers are functional and durable and the waist band is thick but stretchy. The fabric has a nice weight to it which helps it hang well.

This skirt is so cool! It fits great, and the skirt is very full, even with all the zippers closed. The style is so cute, and it's very flattering. The thick waistband is nice and stretchy; it also has a zipper in the back, which makes it easy to get on and off without over-stretching it. If you tend to rest at the "high end" of your regular size, you'll want to go up one size. I think the price is quite reasonable. I love how it looks with my chunky, lace-up, knee-high boots!

评论概述: Cute; Ok Quality; Little Scratchy; Short
评论详情: I got the extra large white skirt. I weigh around 165 pounds and 6'2". Normally I would get a medium or large, but based on other reviews and the sizing chart I went with the extra large size. Extra large fits me pretty much perfectly and I am glad I did not go with a smaller size because they only stretch a little. Based on this I would say that these run small and you should probably go up a size. I know I am tall, but in no way would most people call this a knee length skirt. The bottom of the skirt hits me well above my knees. You may need to wear leggings or similar under it.  The material is not the highest quality, but it is pretty good. It is a little scratchy, but I think it will soften up a little more after a few washes. The two front zippers surprisingly work.  Overall I am happy with this gothic skirt. I am looking forward to being able to wear this to a party or something in the future. I would recommend this to others, but keep in mind it runs small and short.

I bought this as a fun piece to ad to the lingerie collection… but it’s too long for me - because of that reason. It’s a heavy well made skirt. I got an XL, normally a size 12. It fit, so size up. I would usually be a Large.
Fine but lower quality than I expected.

This skirt fits as expected and has some elastic "give" if you need a little extra space at the waistband. Feels good, looks good, and it's pretty versatile. A cute gothy skirt with a splash of plaid for some punk flavor! Five stars!
This skirt is quite well made and fits as expected. The fabric is heavier than I thought it would be which is great, the fit is flattering and it washed well.
Perfect skirt for today’s youth.  Perfect amount of punk Princess, Emo, gothic, anime, cosplay to fit the needs of a wide range of teen girls everywhere.
Got this for a friend who like and is good at taking sexy pictures and biy does she look goid in this skirt would share pics but im respecting her privacy especially on a site with this many users

Both of my daughters really love this style! This skirt is well made and comfortable which is a big plus for teens on the go. Though this skirt would be fab for any age group! I especially love that you can change the look easily by zipping or unzipping the front zippers. This skirt is a great find, we love it!

评论概述: I'm much glad to have a skirt that fits again.
评论详情: It fits great and looks great. I love this skirt. Very gothy vibes. Honestly a little surprised it fit so well but i'm not going to complain that's for sure. Feels good and the waist stretches enough to fit. Seems very well made but only time will tell. For now, i'm pleased.
This is so cute and has enough stretch that I dont really have to unzip to get it on.

I got so excited seeing this beautiful skirt that I forgot to check the size chart. I also didn’t think that maybe I was a little old to be wearing this style, but I would have if it fit! It’s so cute. Usually I wear a size 20 pant and 1X stretchy skirt/legging. I thought for sure the 3X would fit, but it’s not close. I can’t budge the zipper. It is true to size with their size chart, and I really should have known better.  The skirt is so adorable! The layers are well dones with the plaid peeking through and the zippers adjustable. It has a nice comfy waistband with a hidden zipper. It’s actually a high quality piece of clothing at a much lower price than you’d find it as some young people hot alternative store.  Fortunately, all is not lost. My daughter is smaller than I am, and naturally, much younger and within the appropriate demographic to wear this skirt. I will be thrilled to see her in it, even if I can’t wear it. My coworkers are probably relieved.

I got a small and it fits perfectly!  You can zip up / down the front to reveal the flannel pattern better , there’s also a zipper in the back to help you get it on. That zipper was a little difficult to zip, but only because it’s new.  The quality overall is better than I expected. The skirt is nice and thick but also quite light and airy. Not a lot of stretch at all on the waist, so if you’re curvy probably size up if you can!  I really like this skirt and recommend it if it’s your style!
Nock-off skirt but still really nice and cute

评论概述: A Little Small but Made of Good Materials!
评论详情: The fabric is sturdy, the zippers work and don't seem like they'll break. It's made out of pretty good materials!  My complaint is that it does run small. I wear a 3x normally and the 3x here doesn't fit right. Order a size larger than you would normally wear!

Overall, I would be very careful about the sizing. I got a 2XL and it just fits me. I am a 16-18 in size and it just fits.  There is some stretch to the skirt it’s self so if you run a little larger than an 18 it may still fit you, but it’s going to be super tight.  The skirt length is definitely on the short side which is exactly what I was looking for. With a tulle under skirt this is going to be a gorgeous look.  The plaid underskirt is all through the underneath, which gives it a softer feel for sure.  The zipper on the back is a little difficult to zip up and down because the zipper was sewn in quite tight.  The zippers on the front are actual functioning, zippers and add such a cute look to the skirt  Overall, I would definitely recommend this skirt to anyone however, keep in mind it may run just the tiniest bit small. The forgiving quality about the skirt is the somewhat stretchy waist.  Five. Stars you can buy with confidence. Great skirt made beautifully, will look fantastic.
Im a size large and this fit me perfectly, great quality skirt, quite a heavy skirt.

评论概述: Well made. It's a great skirt
评论详情: This is a really fun well made skirt.  You will need to press it but I really love this skirt. The zippers are fun zipped or unzipped.  The skirt is flouncy and adorable.  My husband loved the skirt and said it fit well.  The waist is a little big but better big than too small.  I would buy it again.  Contrasting materials make it interesting and fashionable.  It is short. So be sure to have some cute boy shorts or bloomers on underneath.
You can have a plain black skirt or pull up the zippers and show off a little green plaid to jazz it up a little.  Very cute and can fit in many occasions

I ordeeed this for my daughter, so I ordered her normal size, it fits very well! She loves the design of the skirt. It’s made very well, thick materials, zippers feel great, they aren’t snatching on anything when she uses them. The seams look great, the stitching is top notch. We would buy again or recommend to a friend for sure!

I LOVE this skirt! The fit was perfect, and it's easily worn high or low waisted, so it's gonna be flattering on any body type! I got so many comments the first time I wore it out! The length is perfect, and the green plaid peekaboos are too cute! Def would recommend!!

The skirt is as expected with sizing, and comfy and cute! for wider hips the zipper is a bit difficult to get up, but otherwise not bad. I love the plaid peekaboo design, with a little less fabric in the skirt it would be amazing. As is, you can't particularly see the plaid part except for underneath the skirt. but for a skirt, it is great quality and very cute!

I'm just on the starting edge of plus sized, so finding affordable, cute goth clothes in my size is REALLY hard on the best of days. I'm pleased to report that this fits! It's got elastic in the waist, so I can actually slip it on and off without need for the zipper and it fits snug, but not uncomfortably. Skirt is very spinny and has good volume to it. No pockets, which is a bit of a shame, but not really a dealbreaker. The plaid itself stays kind of hidden when standing still--when walking or sitting it's much more noticeable. The skirt itself is also pretty warm!  I WOULD, however, hesitate to call this a "kilt" as in the title. A kilt refers to a very specific piece of Scottish cultural dress and this... isn't that. You can't just make every skirt plaid and call it a kilt, especially not a skirt designed as womenswear when kilts are specifically menswear. That, however, is a nitpick in presentation of product, and not a criticism of the product itself. Just something I thought I'd point out!

Really cute and high quality. The fabric is heavy and the zippers zip up and down to make two styles. It's super full and needs no petticoat.  Fits perfectly. I am at size 14/16 and fit perfect. I would love this in other colors. But the green is really cute. Paired with boots and fishnets, it looks amazing.

I wear a women's Medium or a Jr's Large. and was gifted this in a medium. My waist is 29.5 inches and it's a bit tight so maybe a large would be a better fit, that won't stop me 🤣. It's fabric is comfortable, the zipper quality leaves a little to be desired but I've noticed a lot of cheap zippers on new clothes recently.
I love this skirt but it’s a tight fit. I recommend ordering a size up.

This is very well made and it's beautiful. Unfortunately it doesn't fit. I usually wear a size 22 in jeans and 3 to 4 XL in leggings so I really thought this 4XL skirt would be big enough, but no, it's just too small to zip up fully. Disappointed. But it's still a really nice skirt.
